room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: We did the casino breakout room for my brothers 18th bday and it was very fun! We finished the game in exactly 50mins.  The people there were very friendly and kind. It was a bit hard to find the place but everyone loved it!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: Fun fun fun.I took my Mom, Dad and Friend. HiLarious!We did the Casino Room. Between my Dad's math skills, my Mom's love for mysteries and private eye things and my friends love for games I figured we might have a chance.We got further than I was thinking we would based on how we began  but we didnt crack the code but we had so much fun.#Sunshine our Game Master was great on allowing us to fiddle and get confused and only popping in with clues if absolutely needed. We got stumped plenty of times.We will be baCK.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: I went here this evening to celebrate my Aunts birthday. It was my first time going( 6/7 of the others had been there before) We did the Casino room. It was ALOT of fun and we got out in less the. 45 mins. #Wesley was our Game Master and was so awesome. Canâ€™t wait to go back again... I wish I could give this place more stars

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: Had a great time! Can't wait to try the other rooms. We barely broke out of Casino Royale. Sam was super friendly and gave us the opportunity to solve the clues on our own with the amount of help we asked for. We'll definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: Had a wonderful experience. Justin was our game master he was so helpful and friendly. We completed the Casino Break Out room with 9 minutes left.
